```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)
library(readr)

library(ggradar)

thyroid <- read_csv("../A_Datas/thyroid_tidy.csv")
data3 <- read.csv("../A_Datas/age.csv",encoding = 'UTF-8')
```



Ⅲ.Comparision {data-orientation=rows}
=======================================================================

Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------

Veuillez entrer le numéro du patient

```{r}
numericInput(inputId = 'Patient_number', label = "Numéro du patient", value = 1, min = 1, max = nrow(thyroid), step = 1)

# Définir la barre latérale (onglets)
sliderInput("bw_adjust", label = "Bandwidth adjustment:",
            min = 0, max = 10, value = 1, step = 1)
```



Row {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
### Chart C

```{r}
#雷达图3
renderPlot({
ggradar(data3,
        base.size = 20,
        values.radar = c("0", "50", "100"),
        grid.min = 0, grid.mid = 60, grid.max = 120,
        group.line.width = 1,
        group.point.size = 3,
        background.circle.colour = "white",
        gridline.mid.colour = "grey",
        
        legend.title = "Indicators",
        legend.text.size = 10,
        plot.title = "A")
})
```
